00023     class RefData
00024     {
00025             std::string mHandle;
00026 
00027             MWScript::Locals mLocals; // if we find the overhead of heaving a locals
00028                                       // object in the refdata of refs without a script,
00029                                       // we can make this a pointer later.
00030             bool mHasLocals;
00031             bool mEnabled;
00032             int mCount; // 0: deleted
00033 
00034             // we are using shared pointer here to avoid having to create custom copy-constructor,
00035             // assignment operator and destructor. As a consequence though copying a RefData object
00036             // manually will probably give unexcepted results. This is not a problem since RefData
00037             // are never copied outside of container operations.
00038             boost::shared_ptr<MWMechanics::CreatureStats> mCreatureStats;
00039             boost::shared_ptr<MWMechanics::NpcStats> mNpcStats;
00040             boost::shared_ptr<MWMechanics::Movement> mMovement;
00041 
00042             boost::shared_ptr<ContainerStore<RefData> > mContainerStore;
00043 
00044         public:
00045 
00046             RefData() : mHasLocals (false), mEnabled (true), mCount (1) {}
00047

00049             {
00050                 return mHandle;
00051             }
00052 
00053             int getCount() const
00054             {
00055                 return mCount;
00056             }
00057 
00058             void setLocals (const ESM::Script& script)
00059             {
00060                 if (!mHasLocals)
00061                 {
00062                     mLocals.configure (script);
00063                     mHasLocals = true;
00064                 }
00065             }
00066

00068             {
00069                 mHandle = handle;
00070             }
00071

00075             }
00076

00080             }
00081

00083             {
00084                 return mEnabled;
00085             }
00086 
00087             void enable()
00088             {
00089                 mEnabled = true;
00090             }
00091 
00092             void disable()
00093             {
00094                 mEnabled = true;
00095             }
00096
